We provide a helper method which aims to make plotting indicators simple. For further information on the charting API please see our Charting section.

private ArnaudLegouxMovingAverage _alma;
// In Initialize()
_alma = ALMA(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_alma.IsReady)
{
    Plot("My Indicators", "ALMA Period", _alma.Period);
    Plot("My Indicators", "ALMA Current", _alma.Current);
}
# In Initialize()
self.alma = self.ALMA(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.alma.IsReady:
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ALMA Period", self.alma.Period);
    self.Plot("My Indicators", "ALMA Current", self.alma.Current);
